questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The cat is sitting _______ the table (on/over).'
Spot the mistake: 'The dog is besides the couch.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The keys are the drawer.'
questions.answer: The keys are in the drawer.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The book is placed _______ the two vases (between/beyond).'
Spot the mistake: 'The picture is hanged on the wall.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The ball is the box.'
questions.answer: The ball is in the box.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The bird is flying _______ the trees (through/over).'
Spot the mistake: 'She is standing at the corner of the street.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The painting is the wall.'
questions.answer: The painting is on the wall.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The car is parked _______ the garage (in/on).'
Spot the mistake: 'The kids are playing into the park.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The shoes are the shelf.'
questions.answer: The shoes are on the shelf.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The lamp is placed _______ the table and the bed (between/beside).'
Spot the mistake: 'The cat is sleeping over the bed.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The cookies are the jar.'
questions.answer: The cookies are in the jar.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The stars are shining _______ the sky (in/on).'
Spot the mistake: 'The books are kept besides the lamp.'
Change the sentence to include a preposition of space: 'The glasses are the counter.'
questions.answer: The glasses are on the counter.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The tree is planted _______ the house (beside/between).'
Spot the mistake: 'The dog jumped over the fence and is now in the garden.'
